title: News24.com | Covid-19 wrap: Global death toll passes 165 000, Spain daily deaths drop below 400 for first time
description: The worldwide death toll from the novel coronavirus (Covid-19) pandemic has risen to 165 216, according to a tally from official sources compiled by AFP at 11:00 (GMT).
content:
